disclaimer: THIS IS NOT LEGAL ADVICE. This configuration is a starting point for research only and must be reviewed by licensed attorneys in each jurisdiction. Statutes change frequently. Always verify current law.

AL.legalCode: Alabama Code Title 26 (Infants and Incompetents) and Title 12-15 (Juvenile Proceedings)

discovery: Alabama Rules of Juvenile Procedure Rule 16
parentalRights: Ala. Code § 26-18-1 et seq. (Termination of Parental Rights)

AL.noticeRules: Generally 5 days notice for adjudication hearings; 72-hour shelter care hearing after removal
AL.captionFormat:
IN THE JUVENILE COURT OF [COUNTY] COUNTY, ALABAMA
IN THE MATTER OF: [CHILD NAME], A Child

AK.legalCode: Alaska Statutes Title 47 Chapter 10 (Child in Need of Aid)
AK.noticeRules: 72-hour temporary custody hearing; reasonable notice for subsequent proceedings
AK.captionFormat:
IN THE SUPERIOR COURT FOR THE STATE OF ALASKA
[JUDICIAL DISTRICT]
IN THE MATTER OF: [CHILD NAME], A Child in Need of Aid

discovery: Arizona Rules of Procedure for the Juvenile Court Rule 17
parentalRights: A.R.S. § 8-533 et seq. (Termination of Parent-Child Relationship)

AZ.noticeRules: Preliminary protective hearing within 5 days of removal; reasonable notice for dependency hearings
AZ.captionFormat:
IN THE SUPERIOR COURT OF ARIZONA
IN AND FOR THE COUNTY OF [COUNTY]
IN THE MATTER OF: [CHILD NAME], A Dependent Child

AR.agency: Arkansas Division of Children and Family Services (DCFS)
AR.noticeRules: 72-hour probable cause hearing after emergency custody; reasonable notice for adjudication
AR.captionFormat:
IN THE [COUNTY] COUNTY JUVENILE COURT
STATE OF ARKANSAS
IN THE MATTER OF: [CHILD NAME], A Juvenile

CA.agency: County Child Welfare Services Departments (varies by county)
CA.legalCode: California Welfare and Institutions Code Division 2 (Children)

recordsAccess: Cal. Welf. & Inst. Code § 827 (access to records)

CA.noticeRules: Detention hearing within 2 court days of removal; 10-day notice for jurisdiction hearing
CA.captionFormat:
SUPERIOR COURT OF CALIFORNIA
COUNTY OF [COUNTY]
IN RE: [CHILD NAME], A Minor

CO.agency: County Departments of Human/Social Services (state oversight by CDHS)

discovery: Colorado Rules of Juvenile Procedure Rule 15

CO.noticeRules: Shelter hearing within 48 hours (excluding weekends/holidays); reasonable notice for adjudication
CO.captionFormat:
IN THE DISTRICT COURT IN AND FOR [COUNTY] COUNTY, COLORADO
CONCERNING: [CHILD NAME], A Child

CT.agency: Connecticut Department of Children and Families (DCF)

emergencyHearings: Conn. Gen. Stat. § 46b-129 (order of temporary custody)

CT.noticeRules: Hearing within 10 days of removal; reasonable notice for subsequent proceedings
CT.captionFormat:
SUPERIOR COURT FOR JUVENILE MATTERS
JUDICIAL DISTRICT OF [DISTRICT]
IN RE: [CHILD NAME], A Child

usageCaveats: THIS DATA IS A RESEARCH STARTING POINT ONLY
Statutes are subject to amendment; always verify current law
Court procedures vary significantly by county and judge
Local rules may add requirements not reflected here
This is NOT a substitute for licensed legal counsel
Users must consult with an attorney licensed in their jurisdiction
Developers: This data requires legal review before production use
